title: Generate app icons for PWA
description: Create app icons in required sizes (192x192, 512x512, etc) for manifest. Apple touch icon. Favicon set.
closed_reason: Created PWA icons (192x192, 512x512 + maskable variants), Apple touch icon (180x180), favicon set (16x16, 32x32 PNG + ICO). Added manifest.json with proper icon references. Updated index.html with favicon links, apple-touch-icon, manifest link, theme-color meta, and Apple PWA meta tags.
